column1: Tanga District (or Tanga City Council) is one of the ten districts of the Tanga Region of Tanzania. The district is bordered to the north by Mkinga District and to the south by Muheza District. The administrative capital of the district is Tanga city.
According to the 2012 Tanzania National Census
column2: the population of Tanga District was 273

column1: Paved trunk road T13 from Segera to the Kenyan border passes through the district.

column2: Tanga District was administratively divided into 24 wards.
